ROW.NAME: 应缴税费信息的应征处理日期与缴款书的上解日期不一致

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum,t.* from ( select YZPZXH "应征凭证序号", YZPZMXXH "应征凭证明细序号", YZPZZL_DM "应征凭证种类代码", DJXH "登记序号", (select nsrmc from cj_fxjk.dj_nsrxx b where b.djxh=t0.djxh) nsrmc,'' n1, YZFSRQ "应征发生日期", YZCLRQ "应征处理日期", to_char(SJRQ_1,'yyyy-mm-dd') "缴款书上解日期", (select swjgjc from cj_fxjk.DM_GY_SWJG b where t0.zgswskfj_dm=b.swjg_dm) "主管税务所（科、分局）代码", (select swjgjc from cj_fxjk.DM_GY_SWJG b where t0.SKSSSWJG_DM=b.swjg_dm) "税款所属税务机构代码" from ( select yjsf.*,JKS.SJRQ_1 FROM cj_fxjk.ZS_YJSF YJSF,cj_fxjk.ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND TRUNC(YJSF.YZCLRQ) <> TRUNC(JKS.SJRQ_1) and yjsf.SKSSSWJG_DM like '14511%' ) t0 order by SKSSSWJG_DM,djxh ) t

select gx_fz,gx_fm,round(gx_fz/gx_fm*100,4) gx_bl, hz_fz,hz_fm,round(hz_fz/hz_fm*100,4) hz_bl from ( select count(decode(nvl(rqbz,'0'),0,null,1)) gx_fz, count(1) gx_fm, count(decode(substr(SKSSSWJG_DM,0,5),'14511',decode(nvl(rqbz,'0'),0,null,1),null)) hz_fz, count(decode(substr(SKSSSWJG_DM,0,5),'14511',1,null)) hz_fm from ( select yjsf.*,JKS.SJRQ_1, sign(to_char(JKS.SJRQ_1,'yyyymmdd')-to_char(yjsf.YZCLRQ,'yyyymmdd')) rqbz FROM cj_fxjk.ZS_YJSF YJSF,cj_fxjk.ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID --AND TRUNC(YJSF.YZCLRQ) <> TRUNC(JKS.SJRQ_1) ) )
